item.description:
Seeing that we were able to find our way to Bristol,I thought we'd continue in the same area while the weather is still nice. We'll be dining upstairs,overlooking the water. Also I've requested two tables of eight, I thought a long table hasn't been working out for everyone. Also maybe seperate checks for each table might be easier.
DeWolf Tavern Consistently The Best Dining Experience In Rhode Island, Contemporary American Cuisine. Relaxed,historic waterfront setting. Spectacular sunsets.
Also please make a note of the new stricter attendance policy, there is a problem with no call no shows. A dinner reservation is the same if I make it or you make it.
item.how_to_find_us: Hostess will direct you to RI Dining Out meetup

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: DeWolf Tavern
